text: Kelly Thomas (born September 9, 1960) is a former American football tackle. He played for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers from 1983 to 1984 and for the Los Angeles Rams in 1987. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American football tackles Category:USC Trojans football players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players Category:Los Angeles Rams players
title: Kelly Thomas (American football)
